title: [WIP] Bring back CUDA 6.5 support and make pytorch compile on Jetson TK1
body_html:
Jetson TK1 is a bit out of date, which only has CUDA 6.5 support and 32bit armhf CPU. However it is still a great platform to do some IOT like project. I would like to bring back the support to it.

The patch is still under working to cleanup. but it do build and run now.
